Dear Dick:
I am sending you herewith a copy of the current issue of the
Cooper Union Forum program bulletin. You will notice the mention
of the UAEB in Idle last paragraph on the first page. Thousands
of copies of these hplletins are distributed in this area, and
this represents a sample of the promotional possibilities
inherent in the network operation.
Incidentally, Cooper Union has sent us another check for
six hundred dollars ($600), which I am spending on additional
